title: The Sweet Blood
overview: Vampires have evolved in the 21st century. They are no longer drinking human blood from biting their necks. They drink a special vine they make out of a little blood from blood donation bags. The Vatican made a special agreement with the human world to punish those who are illegally drinking human blood. The power struggle among vampires over the finest wine with the blood of great men started.Yun Seo is a half-human and half-vampire. At her high school, Meo Roo has such sweet blood that he is attracting other vampires. Will she follow her instinct or her love?
